text: Non-pharmacologic management of delirium Pharmacological treatment of delirium should be a second line approach. The mnemonic “Dr DRE” has been used as an approach to treatment of delirium: ¢ Disease Remediation {e.g. address precipitants of delirium such as sepsis, COPD, congestive cardiac failure) * Drug Removal (stop benzodiazepines, opioids and any other deliriogenic drug) ¢ Environment (promote sleep-wake architecture, reduce noise, mobilise patients, provide hearing aids and spectacles). Only after the above have been addressed, should pharmacological treatment be explored.
